name.text: 37.1.1.6 Example permutation take two at a time

questiontext.text:
Example

Find the number of permutations of the four letters \(A, B, C\) and \(D\) taken two at a time.

Solution

We may choose the first letter in 4 ways and the second letter in 3 ways giving us \(\qquad 4\times 3=\dfrac{4\times 3\times 2\times 1}{1\times 2}=\dfrac{4!}{2!}=12\quad\) permutations
